name: Malgrim Research Institute
description: Thanks for playing our game!  This was made in a week for the Community Game Jam 2019.  The developers (Josh and Jacob) are two brothers.  They have shared their project planning collaboration folders here!  They thought it would be fun to let people see the development of this game.  If you'd like to view the flowchart in an editable way be sure to add the draw.io app into your google drive list of apps.
